name: Bilingual Typer
short_description:
I have worked with a programmer friend in order to help the Spanish community in my city.  This project also helps native english speakers to learn vocabulary in Spanish as well.  The parsed information is a connected trio of english word, spanish word, and pronunciation of the english word for a spanish speaker.

at the moment I have a functioning program from him but don´t know how to upload the code to sourceforge.  if you can help with this first it would aid in avoiding re-covering a lot of ground.
summary: Typing program that provides spanish and equivalent english words
